page.title: 15TOURISM
page.content: This is quite a popular tourist area as it is in an excellent centre from which to visit the{Yorkshire Dales, {North Yorkshire Moors, the Yorkshire {coast and the ancient City of York.} There are several holiday proporties available and these are well booked during the summer months. There is also bed and breakfast accomodation. The village pond with ducks and surrounding green attracts people for picnics. Holiday makers also come to fish in the river Ure. As the{Royal Canadian Air Force}were stationed here during the Second World War large numbers of Canadians return here as tourists.
